{
    "title" :"Shipping and Receiving Clerk",
    "clientName" :"ccb78fc7-81e9-47cd-9085-ad0d50d330dd",
    "contactNumber":"03034090083d",
    "email" :"mansoor.ali@gmail.com",
    "accountManager":"18d86656-5f7f-44ca-83a6-531e28862572",
    "assignRecruiter" :"6affa03c-87cf-47cf-a765-d14d065b9219",
    "dateOpened":"2022-09-09",
    "jobStatus" :"Active",
    "jobType" :"Temporary", 
    "workExperience" :"1 years",
    "department" :"c28d2831-f003-4f00-ba89-0a4c8e73b79d",  
    "skillSet":"Scanning and sorting incoming and outgoing stock.Receiving, stocking, and stacking.", 
    "salary":"10000",
    "location":"islamabad",
    "country":"pakistan",
    "city":"islamabad",
    "logo":"logo.jpg", 
    "postalCode":"45000", 
    "noOfJobOpening":"4",
    "description" :"A receiving clerk must have a great eye for detail and basic math skills. They must also have adequate physical strength to unload shippings as well as the clerical skills to update records and follow up with suppliers. The goal is to ensure we receive the correct packages and stock them appropriately.",
    "requirments" :"A Shipping Clerk's responsibilities include recording every detail of the order, from packing items into containers to labeling them. They are also accountable for ensuring that each package gets shipped correctly and timely to avoid missing deliveries or lost goods",
    "jobSummry" :"A Shipping Clerk's responsibilities include recording every detail of the order, from packing items into containers to labeling them. They are also accountable for ensuring that each package gets shipped correctly and timely to avoid missing deliveries or lost goods"
}

    "title" :"Node js Devloper",

    "accountManager":"ba91ca68-fd25-469b-9fe0-259e81da996f",
    "assignRecruiter" :"b53fd175-3828-4e13-b326-7f7b8f00e921",
    "dateOpened":"2022-09-09",
    "jobStatus" :"Active",
    "jobType" :"Permanent", 
    "workExperience" :"2 years",
    "department" :"dccc99de-5dd9-41e0-93f4-c15242b33d01",  
    "skillSet":"Java script", 
    "salary":"200000",
    "location":"islamabad",
    "country":"pakistan",
    "city":"islamabad",
    "logo":"logo.jpg", 
    "postalCode":"45000", 
    "noOfJobOpening":"4",
    "description" :"A Python Developer is responsible for coding, designing, deploying, and debugging development projects, typically on the server-side (or back-end). They may, however, also help organizations with their technological framework",
    "requirments" :"BSc in Computer Science, Btech in Computer Science or any other related field Prior Work experience is preferred. Familiarity with ORM Libraries.  Proficient in any 1 Python Framework. Knowledge of Front-end Technologies. Familiarity with Version Control Systems. Fundamentals of Machine learning/ AI.",
    "jobSummry" :"Python Developer responsibilities include writing and testing code, debugging programs and integrating applications with third-party web services. To be successful in this role, you should have experience using server-side logic and work well in a team.."
}
